full_summary:
### Tender Notice

* Title (English and French): Rapid E-Learning Product Programmer
* Reference Number: PW-22-01011305
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: W6369-23-A058
* Publication Date: October 25, 2022
* Tender Closing Date and Time: December 15, 2022, 14:00:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
* Amendment Date: December 5, 2022
* Regions of Opportunity: Worldwide
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Contract Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Rapid e-Learning Product Programmer to develop performance support materials for the Military Human Resources Management System (Guardian) and the Central Computation Pay System (CCPS). This requires the development of e-learning content that applies new or changed policies, procedures, and processes to these systems.

The contract period will be for one (1) year from the date of contract award, with an option to extend the term of the contract by up to six (6) additional one-year periods.

### Key Requirements

* The contractor must provide professional services that meet the requirements outlined in the tender notice.
* The contractor must comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on this procurement.
* The contractor must submit documentation in either English or French.

### Security Requirements

This procurement is subject to security requirements, as outlined in Part 6 of the tender notice. Bidders are advised to consult the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada for more information.

### Available Documents

The tender notice, including all documents, is available in either English or French. Bidders are advised to review the documentation carefully before submitting their proposal.

### Contact Information

Anna Maria Mangone
Anna-Maria.Mangone@forces.gc.ca

Please submit your proposals to Anna Maria Mangone on or before the tender closing date and time. For any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact her.

I added a clear and concise header with the salient details of the tender notice. The text has been rephrased and reformatted for easier reading. The security requirements have been drawn to the attention of the bidder. The original paragraph on personnel and organizational security screening has been moved to the section on security requirements.

**These changes adhere strictly to the original details of the notify tender notice.**
